Description: Body sherd of Attic pottery Gordion cup with part of offset lip; interior: glazed black with reserved band at junction of sharply tooled-off lip; exterior: reserved handle zone with black band above and below; black lower body; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (B601.6.1)

Möller 2000 / Naukratis, Trade in Archaic Greece (p. 231, no. 4)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.0433) (Phase 1)
Brijder Siana III 2000 / Siana Cups III: The Red-black Painter, Griffin-bird Painter, and Siana Cups resembling Lip-cups (p. 556 no. G10)
Smith C 1888 / Acquisitions of British Museum (p. 233, no. 9)
